name: Korok GO
description:
Korok GO is a gigantic location-based Korok hunt around the world.

It is heavily inspired by The Legend of Zelda - Breath of the wild.

Use your Android device to find some Koroks hiding in your area. Solve their challenges and obtain a very rewarding Korok seed !

More than 150 billion Koroks to find !

---

A game by Maître Pantoufle

Link model by Trikeboy (models-resource.com)
Korok model by dobris (blendswap.com)
Other props freely inspired by work from wandersonf600, shariff, chocolatechipmonster (free3d.com)
Skybox from a panorama by ateijelo (ateijelo.com)
Music and SFX from Zelda Breath of the wild (Nintendo)
